name: JBoss BPM & JDV Travel Agency Integration Demo
summary: This is an online employee travel booking process project. It contains multiple web services for looking up disparate datasources for the process, rules to calculate pricing, decision table, compensations features that are triggered when paying with fraud detectedcredit card. Install options - local.
author: Niraj Patel, Shepherd Chengeta, Van Halbert, Andrew Block, Eric D. Schabell
targetProduct: JBoss BPM Suite and JBoss DV
productVersion: JBoss BPM Suite 6.2 and JBoss DV 6.1.1
